mdRecord.dcterms:title: Amber glass bottle
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wheaton Nuline Co. [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Amber glass bottle with a cork stopper; contains embossed print on the side: "A. LANCASTER'S INDIAN VEGETABLE JAUNDICE BITTERS, COL. SAM JOHNSON PROPRIETOR RICHMOND, VA. 1852"; and embossed print on the bottom: "WHEATON, N.J." This is a circa 1970s reproduction of a 1852 bottle.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bottles
